subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Assaults
lead_paragraph: A judge in Cincinnati declared a mistrial in the assault case against Chris Henry, a former Bengals wide receiver. An eight-person jury told the judge it was unable to agree on a verdict. Hamilton County Municipal Judge Richard Bernat then dismissed the jury and set a hearing for July 8.
